title: 26 Top Picks From Abercrombie, Including “The White Lotus” Collection
description: Who would have thought that our closets would be filled with Abercrombie & Fitch again?! Abercrombie has long been famous for its expansive collection of flattering jeans, which are editor-loved. But recently, the retailer went through a little makeover of its own; long gone are the days of logo-filled graphic T-shirts and limited denim offerings, now the brand is a haven for all types of fashion-lovers - and sizes. It's the best place to shop for everything from stylish, elevated basics to vintage-inspired looks, seasonal trends, and even wedding guest dresses. Into football? You can shop the Abercrombie's official NFL collection ahead of the Super Bowl and sport your favorite team. If you're a fan of HBO Max's "The White Lotus," you can also shop the brand's limited edition collection inspired by the show. It's filled with vacation-ready breezy pieces, including textured button down sets and sweatshirts. They also have collaborations with several Formula 1 teams, if you're into fast cars. The brand is clearly back and better than ever, and if TikTok hasn't already convinced you to shop at Abercrombie, let us do that for you. From trendy tops and elevated dresses to comfortable, tailored bottoms, Abercrombie has become synonymous with effortlessly chic clothing. The brand carries everything you need for a fashion-forward closet. From classic denim to its flattering silhouettes and expanded size range, Abercrombie has something for everyone. Plus, if something doesn't fit quite right, or the color you've been eyeing is finally back in stock, the brand makes it convenient to file a return or exchange. Abercrombie & Fitch's Return Policy Abercrombie & Fitch has a return policy of 30 days from the date of the last shipment, as long as you have your receipt, invoice, or order confirmation. Returns received after the 30-day mark will be refunded in an e-gift card for merchandise credit. If you love a style but just need a different size or color, you can exchange it in store or online through this return portal. Active Abercrombie & Fitch Promo Codes and Sales Right now, you can get 25 percent off nearly sitewide for a limited time. You can also get up to 50 percent off clearance. Plus, you can get free shipping when you spend $99 or more. We love browsing the site for the brand's newest arrivals and even scoring a deal or two on a few pieces. So we decided to make your life easier and rounded up our current favorite wardrobe essentials and dresses from Abercrombie, both new and on sale, so you know what's worth buying - especially for the winter. Keep reading to shop our top picks from Abercrombie & Fitch, or jump ahead to the category you're looking for.
